Prev: Sphere With Sphere Up: Mathematical Sculpture at Trinity College Dublin Next: (2,8)-Torus Link, II

(2,8)-Torus Link, I



The actual title of this sculpture, by Brian King, is "Double Helix"; it refers to the structure of DNA. But the geometric topologists have adopted it as their own...
Taken Friday, September 18, 2009, 11:22:33PM. Original image size: 2592x3888, 1.5Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS 40D, 1/30s@ F8, ISO 400, 17-85mm f/4-5.6 IS, 70mm (112mm equiv)
PS CS2 5200:5, 0:12:50:0:10, RC15, USM 30:5
